segments.text: What are your terms of sale ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: The price quoted is for CIF .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: My understanding is that CIF means the seller is responsible for prepaying shipping costs and arranging for the insurance policy .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , that is correct . We will arrange for the shipping costs and insurance policy .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Is it possible to consider FOB ? That way , we will handle the insurance through our broker .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yes , we could also make this arrangement , , if you prefer .
segments.speaker: S2
